name: Micro (itch)
description:
Inspired by games like Warioware and the Dumb Ways to Die mobile game, Micro is an arcade game where you rush through up to 10 "microgames" that get progressively faster and more difficult the further you get. Go for the highest scores that you can, and even compete against your friends!

Micro is currently being developed by Infinity Scope, a team of 1 programmer and 1 artist that hope to one day create amazing games. This is their 2nd game, and they hope to create many more games in the future!

Micro is a free game, and will always be a free game. The game will be updated every once in a while with new content, graphical updates, and bug fixes. Check back every once in a while, you never know if there will be an update!

You can find Infinity Scope through:

Twitter

Discord

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

1. Download the game

2. Extract the zip files

3. (Optional) Create a shortcut so you can easily access the .exe

4. Enjoy the game!
